Uses of Package
com.simpleprogrammer.infinitetcp

  • Classes in com.simpleprogrammer.infinitetcp used by com.simpleprogrammer.infinitetcp 
    Class Description
    Connection
    This class implies a connection to a Client however it can not be instantised.
    A connection is created when a Client joins the Server.
    Listener
    This interface defines a Listener.onDisconnect() method and an Listener.onReceive(Object) method
    The Listener.onDisconnect() method is called when the Client disconnects from the Server and
    the other method Listener.onReceive(Object) is called when an object is received from the Server.
    ServerListener
    This interface defines a ServerListener.onDisconnect(Connection) method, a ServerListener.onReceive(Connection, Object) method, and a ServerListener.onConnect(Connection) method
    The ServerListener.onDisconnect(Connection) method is called when a Client disconnects from the Server and
    the method ServerListener.onReceive(Connection, Object) is called when an object is received from a Client and
    the method ServerListener.onConnect(Connection) is called when a Client connects to the Server .
